page.title: 11WILLOW PLACE-LIGHT INDUSTRY
page.content: S.W. corner:{490080}.WILLOW PLACE is a pleasant micro-residential area in a totally rural setting. A haven for the retired or the commuter and yet for no obvious reason a narrow strip of light industrial development has taken place at the eastern edge. Here is to be found HANNAH DIRECT LIGHTING COMPANY with a new showroom frontage grafted onto an old building. This company supplies a considerable range of lighting & display materials and operates a retail outlet. THE HASTINGWOOD PROPERTY COMPANY have their office here & associated builders yard together with a vehicle repair workshop. Here also is to be found the workshop of KINGS FURNITURE. Their speciality is custom-built domestic furniture of all types including occasional tables ,
